title: Mum's apple tart
ingredients: ['Pastry', '200g (7oz) plain flour', '100g (3 3/4 oz) self-raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '250g (9oz) unsalted butter', '4 tablespoons soured cream or plain yogurt', '1/8 teaspoon lemon juice', 'Filling', '5 large Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced', '100g (3 3/4 oz) caster sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1/2 tablespoon ground nutmeg', '1/8 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 egg, beaten']
